latest: **Security**: 0-Click Zendesk Account Takeover Vulnerability Enables Access to all Zendesk Tickets - CyberSecurityNews
weekly: **New Features**: API support for WhatsApp Flows, import enhancements for the Exchange and Gmail connectors and the move of Zendesk QA user and license management to Zendesk Admin Center. **Service Issues**: 5 incidents/maintenance.
monthly: **New Features**: a new approach to email authentication, the new external Oauth page in Admin Center, the excluded terms enhancement to AI-generated translations, plus 1 more. **Security**: Developer update: Enhanced security guidelines for third-party apps, integrations, and bots, Duo Protection for Zendesk with Duo Access Gateway - Duo Security. **Service Issues**: 5 incidents/maintenance.

release_notes.summary: Feature: Admins can now add existing macros in Copilot auto assist procedures, enabling more customized automation workflows. Feature: AI Agents Advanced has been updated with new capabilities to enhance administrator management and oversight of AI agents.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-08-22
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
AI Agents Advanced
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
